title: Diamond Cascade Jhumka: Contemporary Twist on a Classic Adhika
features: A modern take on the traditional Jhumka. Features three floral diamond clusters connected by a delicate diamond line. The lower cluster is a slightly larger inverted floral cluster. Features post and screw backs with a flower design.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to add a touch of modern elegance with a South Indian flair. Also suitable for a modern bride's Sangeet or Reception.
description: These earrings showcase a unique blend of modern design and traditional inspiration. The brilliant-cut diamonds add exceptional sparkle. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. Exceptional Value.
